Spanish.question: ¿Puedo tener la cuenta, por favor?
options: Can I have the bill, please?
Can I have a glass of water?
Spanish.answer: Can I have the bill, please?

Spanish.question: Si pudieras viajar a cualquier parte, ¿a dónde irías?
options: If you could eat anything, what would you eat?
If you could travel anywhere, where would you go?
If you could meet anyone, who would you meet?
If you had a million dollars, what would you do?
Spanish.answer: If you could travel anywhere, where would you go?

Spanish.question: Cuando era joven, solía jugar en el parque.
options: When I was young, I used to play in the park.
When I am old, I will play in the park.
I play in the park every day.
I never played in a park.
Spanish.answer: When I was young, I used to play in the park.

Spanish.question: Es importante que todos reciclemos.
options: It is important that we all recycle.
Spanish.answer: It is important that we all recycle.

Spanish.question: Antes de que salgas, apaga las luces.
options: Before you leave, turn off the lights.
After you leave, turn on the lights.
Before you eat, turn off the lights.
After you arrive, close the door.
Spanish.answer: Before you leave, turn off the lights.
